name: OMORI VR White Space DEMO
description:
VR HEADSET REQUIRED

Works with Steam VR and Oculus

This is a VR game and an early early early tech demo.

I do not guarantee anything to work, but I'd say it's worth a try.

OMORI is made by OMOCAT and her team. I don't own and am not affiliated with it in any way. 

Link to OMOCAT stuff:

https://www.omori-game.com

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1150690/OMORI/

This is a non-profit fan project just for fun.

The game will always be free and available.

...but if you would like to throw a dollar at it, it would help me out. thank you :)
